reviewText: Crissy Moran is really on in this DVD a must have for her fans or anybody who likes beautiful women

This video collection of Luther Vandross and his videos is exactly the same as "The Best Of Luther Vandross," a 1991 VHS tape with all these videos and interviews with Luther talking, so in that case I already have this whole video collection of Luther Vandross. And from the VHS that I have it from, I also have it converted on a DVD where I would watch it from, so that the VHS tape doesn't ware. This is really a video collection that came out back in 1991 on the VHS tape, and it was just remastered from the VHS tape. And I can see that I was remastered back in 2011, which was 20 years later from when it was really released. So, it would be a waste of money for me to buy this DVD with Luther's videos, because I have it already.
Could get it all on youtube

Definitivamente Crissy Moran es una de las mejores Peach Girls,
su pcara sonrisa, su lindo rostro y su cuerpo la hacen sin lugar
a dudas una de las favoritas de la gente.
En este DVD aparece en varias locaciones distintas, con diferentes
vestuarios para satisfacer los gustos de cada quien.
La fotografa e imgenes son excelentes y las actuaciones de
Crissy hacen en definitiva que uno quiera seguir viendo ms y ms.
En general una muy buena recopilacin llena de escenas muy sexys,
pcaras, sensuales y sugerentes como solo Crissy sabe hacerlas.

Truth be told, I'm more into blondes, but this busty little brunette stunner really lit my fire. Her combination of bedroom eyes, pouty lips, big, bouncy top, bubble-b*tt and her willingness to "bare all" had me looking her up and seeking out her DVDs. Unfortunately, The Ultimate Collection: Crissy Moran doesn't live up to the expectations of a "best of" DVD because it drags, gets redundant and lacks the explicitness of Crissy's best performances.

Being a vet of Peach items, I was expecting a variety of girls - even in their "Peach Obsession" series where they feature one "super-babe" (see Peach Obsession: Rachel), they offer other girls for variety, and put the feature in some girl girl scenes. Here, all only get Crissy - she's very cute, but the action gets old after a while. We basically get her doing the same dance-gyrating stripper stuff in many scenes - locations and clothing change but that's about it in this "greatest hits" release. Crissy's game ofcourse, but babe-variety is a key ingredient to making even the lamest DVD watchable. After a while, you see her do her thing and start going crazy on the FF (instead of on yourself). Also, after several scenes, the "flaws" (fake boobs, plastic surgery, blemishes) become a bit clearer, and you're looking at a hot babe in a bar, not an adult supermodel.

This is all made worse by the fact that this one is not as explicit as Crissy's other work - the squats and spreads are fewer and not as bold, and we get more "hide the prize" camera angles.

Crissy shows more in almost all other Peach titles (she is stellar in  The Ultimate Collection: The Best Of The Best, Vol. 2), and is joined by other hot babes that make things more interesting. Not terrible, but check out other stuff first.
